goal.en: 1, the course of the subject analysis method, the history of Taiwan on the important issues in-depth analysis, in addition to the teacher described the background of the historical matters and the causal relationship, and led by TA students to study the relevant historical materials and works of study, the purpose of So that students understand the history of the development of Taiwan's civilization, but also to improve the ability of students to analyze the ability to distinguish, and take the initiative to learn. 2, in order to strengthen the interest and willingness of students in different disciplines, in addition to through the PPT, Chinese and English lectures and film and television materials to talk and group discussions and activities, but also hope that students can learn from Taiwan history knowledge, thinking about how their own use Or combined with the history of Taiwan, and then play the imagination of space, to create a cross-disciplinary integration of the product, in order to cultivate their unity, creativity and execution.
goal.ch: 1、本課程採課題分析法，就臺灣歷史上之重要課題進行深入分析，除由教師闡述相關史事之背景與因果關係外，並由TA帶領選課同學進行相關史料與論著之研讀，目的除使同學了解臺灣文明發展之歷程外，亦藉此提高學生歷史的分析辨別能力，並能主動學習。 2、為強化不同學科學生的學習興趣與意願，課程中除透過PPT、中英文講義與影視材料進行講述與分組討論與活動外，亦希望同學能在接受臺灣史知識後，思考自身學科如何運用或結合臺灣史，進而發揮想像空間、創作出科際整合的產物，藉以培養彼等之統整力、創造力與執行力。

content.en:
1. Guidance
2. Taiwan in the international maritime era
3. The rise and fall of Ming Zheng
4. Immigration in the early Qing Dynasty
5. the early Qing Dynasty people and fights
6. Open port in the late Qing Dynasty trade
7. The modernization of the late Qing Dynasty
8. Mid-term group report
9. Keynote presentations
10. Colonial domination and confrontation
11. Colonial social change
12. The development of modern education
13. Limits of the movement of imperialism
14. wartime system under Taiwan
15. the early post-war capacity
16. The termination of authoritarian rule
17. Final report
18. Final exam
content.ch:
1.導讀
2.國際海權時代的台灣
3.明鄭的興起與衰敗
4.清初的偷渡與移民
5.清初的民變與械鬥
6.清末的開港通商
7.清末的近代化建設
8.期中分組報告
9.專題演講
10.殖民地的統治與對抗
11.殖民地的社會變遷
12.近代化教育的開展
13.皇民化運動的限縮
14.戰時體制下的台灣
15.戰後初期的變容
16.威權統治的終止
17.期末分組報告
18.期末測驗

textbook.en: 1.Davison, Gary Marvin A Short History of Taiwan: The Case for Independence, Westport: Praeger Publishers, 2003. 2.Denny Roy, Taiwan: A Political History, New York: Cornell University Press, 2002. 3.Hung Chien-Chao, A new history of Taiwan : Asia's first republic in the new millennium, Taipei : Central News Agency, 2011. 4.Jonathan Manthorpe, Forbidden Nation: A History of Taiwan, New York: Palgrave Macmillan,2005. 5.Wan-yao Chou, A New Illustrated History of Taiwan, Taipei : SMC Publishing, 2015.

grading.en: 1, group report: the creation of the history of Taiwan as a material of the object, accounting for 40% of the total score. 2, the end of the test: the implementation of the final exam, view the students absorb and learn results, accounting for 30% of the total score. 3, historical research: study and analysis of classroom-related information, according to the interpretation and answer ability to points, accounting for 20% of the total score. 4, speech experience: write more than 1000 words of the key speech report, accounting for 10% of the total s
grading.ch: 1、分組報告：創作以臺灣史為素材之物件，佔學期總成績40%。 2、期末測驗：實施期末考，檢視同學吸收與學習成效，佔學期總成績30%。 3、史料研讀：研讀與分析課堂相關資料，依解讀與回答能力給分，佔學期總成績20%。 4、演講心得：撰寫1000字以上之專題演講心得報告，佔學期總成績10%。
